item.title: GP Multi-Company SmartLists - Part 1
item.description:
Part 1: Creating Multi-Company SmartLists in Microsoft Dynamics GP 1. Introduction This series will guide you through creating SmartLists that combine data from multiple Dynamics GP companies. We’ll leverage SmartList Builder, custom SQL scripts, and address security considerations. This solution is particularly beneficial for organizations with numerous GP company databases managed centrally, such as Consolidated Property Corporation in our example. While this solution involves SQL queries and Visual Basic scripting, each step will be broken down to make it manageable for those without extensive programming experience...
